Articles.Content: I think I'll download this just for the parts! This is one of the best looking projects going right now, and I'm glad to see that you've finally gone to Beta. I wasn't quite up to the task of dealing with the Alpha stage of this project, lol.
Sure that sounds fun, lets agree to add TAC support in the future. You may need to remind me
Issue with the SUPER HAB .craft...same thing with the MTV HAB .craft

Issue with the SUPER HAB .craft...same thing with the MTV HAB .craft

http://i.imgur.com/XH19V4s.jpg

Yikes. Hey will you see if the LP NTR SUPER HAB craft has the same issue?
I just checked and I couldn't duplicate that so I will investigate further tomorrow

*Cough, cough*

You forgot to license Aerojet Kerbodyne

Upper stage engines dont have any effects?

https://i.imgur.com/lwgtjgu.png

https://i.imgur.com/AlDERhz.png

Just a question, do you use Sensible pumps?

EDIT:

Chaka Monkey - Launches mod parts before it was released in the mod's release thread itself. Haha (referring to Aerojet Kerbodyne)

Edited August 16, 2014 by blackheart612
Yeah, im having all sorts of issues with your .crafts.. might be my install.. will make a fresh and start from scratch. more to follow

*Cough, cough*

You forgot to license Aerojet Kerbodyne

Just a question, do you use Sensible pumps?

No I dont even know what that is.

Just discovered another problem? What do you suppose could be causing this?

Sure that sounds fun, lets agree to add TAC support in the future. You may need to remind me

That sounds like a plan

No I dont even know what that is.

Just discovered another problem? What do you suppose could be causing this?

https://i.imgur.com/NdR9IDp.png

https://i.imgur.com/IjBaIhU.png

Is that an all white texture? Maybe it's just a problem with texture loading.

Is that an all white texture? Maybe it's just a problem with texture loading.

I don't know. I have never had that problem before and those screen shots are from two different launches.

I don't know. I have never had that problem before and those screen shots are from two different launches.

Maybe you should try restarting your game Haha

Maybe you should try restarting your game Haha

I did. It has to do with the internal lights. When I turn the the internal lights on the capsule turns all white. Specifically the internal flood lights.

So this is with the lights off in the capsule.

This is with the lights on
Aah.. Yanfret might have messed with the Emissives of the capsule, he should fix it soon

Aah.. Yanfret might have messed with the Emissives of the capsule, he should fix it soon

Oh Im sure he will. Im just reporting the problems as I see them. Just glad I figured where the problem was coming from for that one, now Yanfret can narrow it down. Is the Altair ascent pod supposed to have an IVA?

OK.. The first issue was solved with a new install.. now im getting this issue.. Cant stage the rocket, nothing.. just sits there, and get a fuel flow of NaNU..

Mods are as follows..

Toolbar

Chaka BETA

DRE

Rastaprop

KJR

Mechjeb

RealChute

SelectRoot

ShipManifest

KAC
Same problem as ophetious on Both LP Stations and Station Cupola have them in VAB and loss all Stages at pad and you have some leftover files in CEMS/Electrical/CommEquip.

Same problem as ophetious on Both LP Stations and Station Cupola have them in VAB and loss all Stages at pad and you have some leftover files in CEMS/Electrical/CommEquip.

Does that happen on a clean install?
Check to make sure you have the IVA files.

The recommended flight path in the OP... Why THAT particular trajectory? Because with FAR I need much shallower ascent path. Turn start at 160m, End at 35km with a pitch rate of 45.

Would such a trajectory not be possible with this hardware?

I am stealing this gif from someone who posts on the forums but I don't care. This is my reaction to seeing the front page, and the new pictures!

http://www.reactiongifs.us/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/sweet_jesus.gif

XD thanks for using mine :):)

YANFRET: you should think about switching to Kerbal Stuff, CurseForge, or Mediafire because Dropbox starts busting people out when large files get a lot of traffic. I believe this happened to NathanKell with Real Solar System once the file size started getting bigger with each update. (not to mention that the download speeds on these three sites are much faster compared to Dropbox; I get 0.5 mbps from Dropbox and 4.5 mbps on Kerbal Stuff, with fiber optic connection)

YANFRET: you should think about switching to Kerbal Stuff, CurseForge, or Mediafire because Dropbox starts busting people out when large files get a lot of traffic. @Yanfret I did a new install and started installing mods 1 by 1 and the new JSI is was my problem so what ver. did you test with ? Or need to look at the new JSI and see why it's doing that.
